Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #411948 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BppDR:ref - Automatic reply: [External] RE: SATagParser.CLI.EXE is creating logs in executable folder    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BppDR:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Scott

The issues with SATagParser.CLI.EXE producing log files in executable was review by R&D. A hotfix was produced and released:
 
Title: SA_11.5_098 

Summary:   SATagParser.CLI.EXE has new logs output in the bin folder 

11.5 

Affected Module: 

Action Module – File System 

Dev Ticket: 

327460 

Resolved in Version: 


	
	ActionsStealthbits.StealthAUDIT.Actions.FileSystem.dll 
	



	
	ActionsFilesystemAMApplet.dll 
	



	
	PrivateAssembliesXMLTagParser.exe 
	



	
	PrivateAssembliesSATagParser.dll 
	



	
	Toolsx86SATagParser.CLI.exe 
	


Other Dependencies Included: 

KB Type:  

Hotfix 

Escalations 

412177 

Instructions: 

1. Unblock the hotfix zip file in the windows property dialog, if an unblock button exists there.  

2. Close all instances of StealthAUDIT (check task manager under processes for all users) 

3. Stop the 'StealthAUDIT File System Action Module Applet' service (if running) 

4. Update all files in your %SAInstallDir% 


https://releases.netwrix.com/products/stealthaudit/11.6/stealthaudit-hotfix-11.5.0.098.zip

I ran this through a test in my lab environment also and confirm it is working as expected with there being no log output.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns regarding this, or the timeline to review the implementation of the hotfix.


Best regards,

Alex Buchta
Support Team Lead EMEA
____________________ _________
Powerful Data Security Made Easy
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX, US 75034
www.netwrix.com
